item.title: [+1176] xkcd: I Don't Want Directions
[+1007] Wow! I had no idea Garry’s Mod could do this [VID]
item.description: Aperture Corporation has won an election over the Combine forces in City 17. In order to expand their business to a larger scale, they chose to take over different sections of the city, evacuating all citizens of the section to build their headquarters. All citizens who resist shall be either apprehended or killed.

item.title: [+986] Now That’s Rich
item.description: Republicans and conservative Democrats are eager to give hundreds of billions of dollars to the 120,000 richest people in America.

item.title: [+913] Fox News co-owner funded 'Ground Zero mosque' imam: report
item.description: The second largest shareholder in News Corp. -- the parent company of Fox News -- has donated hundreds of thousands of dollars to causes linked to the imam planning to build a Muslim community center and mosque near Ground Zero in Manhattan.

item.title: [+837] Kevin Rose: "Why Apple's iTV Will Change Everything"
item.description: The rumor: Apple will be releasing a revamped/renamed version of their 'Apple TV' set-top box, called 'iTV'. The box will run the Apple iOS (same as the iPhone/iPad), and be priced around $99. Why will this change everything?

[+599] Wikileaks' Assange: Pentagon may be behind rape claims
item.description: Wikileaks founder Julian Assange said in an interview published on Sunday that he believes the Pentagon could be behind a rape accusation against him that was later dropped by Swedish prosecutors.

item.title: [+589] The Harsh Truth About Scientology (Infographic)
item.description: Scientology is evil. That much is a fact. Check out the graphic below for more dirty details on the so-called religion.

item.title: [+572] Top 10 Favorites To Win Miss Universe 2010 (+bikini pics)
item.description: This isn’t Miss World or Miss Earth. This is the big show. This is for all the galaxies. We’re talking about the crème de la crème. According to organizers, Miss Universe must be intelligent, will-mannered and cultured. That means you can’t flunk out on the questions and expect to take home the tiara. Just ask Miss South Carolina.

item.title: [+525] ACLU Report: Spying on Free Speech Nearly At Cold War Level
item.description: Political spying is nearly as bad now as it was during the Cold War. The ACLU reports that Americans are harassed and under surveillance for exercising their First Amendment rights.
